entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:35 PM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 12:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Temperature: -14.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -18.5°C
Wind: N 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27 except minus 18 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 27 except minus 18 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16 except minus 22 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 16 except minus 22 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023
